author: mininny
content:
Hello team! I'm Minhyuk from Sunnyside Labs, and we're currently running multiple devnets to identify bottlenecks in PeerDAS as we prepare to increase the blob throughput. You can see our previous reports in [03/11](https://testinprod.notion.site/Sunnyside-Devnet-Updates-03-11-Internal-1b38fc57f54680a9a409d639a8a45bdd?pvs=74), [03/18](https://testinprod.notion.site/Sunnyside-Devnet-Updates-03-18-Internal-1b98fc57f54680d991c3f7a4fefa590b), [03/25](https://testinprod.notion.site/Sunnyside-Devnet-Updates-03-25-Internal-1c08fc57f54680339b2fe2dbc8232b6d). 

We're currently mostly working with the CL team, but as we're involving more EL work into PeerDAS, I imagine more analysis into EL impact would be required. We'd love to get your comments and thoughts about what sort of metrics or test scenarios that you'd like to see in the future devnets regarding peerdas and blob usages (and any other useful tests)! Looking forward to helping the roadmap in any way!

author: pipermerriam
content: For 4444s discussion in todays call, I've posted this updated list https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/953349957400821860/1354813999757267166 of questions and topics that I think should be covered.
